Future goals and plans: I would want to hear about my future self's goals and plans. This would give me a clear understanding of what I need to focus on in the present to achieve those goals in the future.
Regrets and lessons learned: I would want to hear about any regrets my past self has and the lessons learned from those experiences. This would help me avoid making similar mistakes in the future.

Advice from future self: I would want to hear advice from my future self on how to navigate certain situations or challenges that I may face in the future. This would be invaluable in helping me make the right decisions.
Encouragement and motivation: I would want to hear words of encouragement and motivation from my future self. This would help me stay focused and motivated during difficult times.
Insights into my personal growth: I would want to hear about the personal growth my future self has experienced. This would give me a sense of progress and help me see how far I have come.
